html:
AFFIXSUPPORT
An affix must not be prosodically separated from its morpho-phonological host. Assign one violation for each prosodic boundary that separates the host and the affix.
imtwordsbare: An affix must not be prosodically separated from its morpho-phonological host. Assign one violation for each prosodic boundary that separates the host and the affix.

html:
ALIGN(DefAcc,R;ω,R)
Align the right edge of DefAcc with the right edge of the prosodic word. Assign one violation for each syllable that separates the DefAcc’s and the prosodic word’s right edges.
imtwordsbare: Align the right edge of DefAcc with the right edge of the prosodic word. Assign one violation for each syllable that separates the DefAcc’s and the prosodic word’s right edges.

html:
ALIGN(CP,L;IP,L)
Align the left edge of an Intonation Phrase (IP) to the left edge of a CP. Assign one violation for each syllable that separates the IP’s and CP’s left edges.
imtwordsbare: Align the left edge of an Intonation Phrase (IP) to the left edge of a CP. Assign one violation for each syllable that separates the IP’s and CP’s left edges.

html:
ALIGN(LowDP*,L;IP,L)
Align the left edge of an Intonation Phrase (IP) to the left edge of a lexically filled LowDP. Assign one violation for each syllable that separates the IP’s and the LowDP*’s left edges.
imtwordsbare: Align the left edge of an Intonation Phrase (IP) to the left edge of a lexically filled LowDP. Assign one violation for each syllable that separates the IP’s and the LowDP*’s left edges.
